p: In order to obtain the volatile and other non-polar compounds, but also the polar constituents of S. sipylea, three different techniques were utilized, in parallel. Specifically, hydrodistillation (HD) was employed for the recovery of the essential oil (EO), followed by supercritical fluid extraction (SFE), using supercritical CO 2 (sCO 2), and ultrasound-assisted extraction (UAE) with four different solvents. The extracts obtained by applying the aforementioned techniques are summarized in Table 1, accompanied by the respective extraction yields.
